content.raw: The OS X build was failing because the ignition-math2 homebrew formula was out of date and didn't have the Frustum. I would recommend that we bump the required version of ignition-math2, but ignition-math2 doesn't install a cmake version config file. I'll create an issue.
content.html: The OS X build was failing because the ignition-math2 homebrew formula was out of date and didn't have the Frustum. I would recommend that we bump the required version of ignition-math2, but ignition-math2 doesn't install a cmake version config file. I'll create an issue.
